### Total Score Calculation:
The total score is not an average but rather a holistic evaluation considering all elements. Given the significant misalignment with the pimento olive and its attributes, the overall score is relatively low at 2.333333 out of 5.

This scoring reflects a fair assessment where some elements are perfectly aligned (cruise ship, aerial view), while others are entirely absent or only loosely related (pimento olive, floating giant).
